people.name: Darth Maul
desc: Darth Maul, later known simply as Maul, is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise. Trained as Darth Sidious's first apprentice, he serves as a Sith Lord and a master of wielding a double-bladed lightsaber. He first appears in Star Wars: Episode I â€“ The Phantom Menace (portrayed by Ray Park and voiced by Peter Serafinowicz), and later makes appearances in Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Star Wars Rebels, voiced by Samuel Witwer.
